author: virtualastronomer
description:
The "How to think like a Computer Scientist" books (web based or physical) have long been a recommended starting place for scientists learning to code.  The "strange history of this book" just got a bit more awesome with this interactive, javascript driven, video laced edition of the Python book.  Take it for a spin! 
How to think like a Computer Scientists -- Learning with Python: Interactive Edition
title: How to think like a Computer Scientist: Python INTERACTIVE VERSION!!!
